Windlord:

"I'm Windlord, sir"replied Windlord"We have to take you at my base 
and put you inside a CR... we have to do it quikly, Sir, after that 
you can chat with my leader, Rodimus Prime "



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "dishpanhandninja" <foxmanroar1@a...> 
wrote:
> Convoy smiled and walked over to Sabre, soon he had him lain out 
on a 
> rock as he fiddled with his arm it opened revealing medical 
> supplies... in a few short momments Sabre face was sealed, but his 
> once handesome black and red face was now scared... Convoy looked 
> up. "The scars due to the levels of damage he sustained, if i had 
a 
> nano rod, and a healing chamber I could do more.
> 
> Sabre slowly opened his eyes and looked up. "The... Pods...?"
> 
> WingRazor looked to Convoy. "One down sir, meet convoy.. he saved 
> patched you up."
> 
> Sabre smiled. "Nice to meet you Big guy." He stood slowy... "And 
you 
> are?" he looked over at WindLord.
